channel.description: Recent content in #data on Micro blog

item.title: Geodata notes
item.description: Glossary of geodata # Attributes: the meanings or labels of a data point Coordinate (reference) system (CRS): metadata describing the space in which coordinates exist, e.g. origin, axes, units, etc. Coordinates: numbers describing a data point’s position within a CRS.
